entry.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon 855+
entry.summary: Cluster(s)/big.LITTLE Configuration: Cortex A76 "Kryo 485 Gold" @ 2.96GHz x1 [Shared…
entry.content:
Cluster(s)/big.LITTLE Configuration:

  • Cortex A76 "Kryo 485 Gold" @ 2.96GHz x1 [Shared with Cluster 2]
  • Cortex A76 "Kryo 485 Gold" @ 2.42GHz x3 [L1:512KiB; L2:1MiB]
  • Cortex A55 "Kryo 485 Silver" @ 1.8GHz x4 [L1:512KiB; L2:512KiB]

Memory Specifications:

  • L3 Cache: 2MiB
  • Quad Channel Memory; Single Controller
  • Upto 16GiB LPDDR4X-4266

iGPU/Integrated Peripherals

  • Qualcomm Adreno 640 [@250MHz Base ~ 700MHz Burst Frequency]
  • Qualcomm Spectra 380 ISP : Dual 14-bit CV-ISPs
  • FastConnect 6200 Module
  • X24 Modem [Optional X50 5G Modem on a separate chip]

SKU Information

Model Number SDM855AC
Part Number SM8150AC

entry.title: Global Foundries/AMD Opteron™ A1170
entry.summary: TDP - 32W  Core Count - 8*A57 Aarch64 "Seattle" CoresL2 Cache…
entry.content:
• TDP - 32W 
  • Core Count - 8*A57 Aarch64 "Seattle" Cores
  • L2 Cache - 4MB 
  • L3 Cache - 8MB 
  • Lithography: 28NM TSMC
  • SKUs: OA1170AQD8NAD [BGA:"SP1", OEM/Tray, Jan 2016]
  • CPU Clock GHz - 2.0 
  • Temp Range : 0C – 80C

Memory Specifications

  • Max Supported Memory: 128GB
  • Dual Channel [2 DIMMs per Channel]
  • Max DDR3 Rate - 1600MHz
  • Max DDR4 Rate - 1866MHz
  • ECC : Yes

iGPU/Integrated Peripherals

  • iGPU: N/A
  • PCIe 3.0 8 lanes 
  • SATA 6GB/S*14 
  • Network: 10GbE x2 
  • Misc: I2C; SPI; UART
